subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Denver Nuggets rebuilt on the fly after trading the All-Star Carmelo Anthony to the Knicks, and now boast a fluid team that can contend in the N.B.A.’s Western Conference.
snippet: The Denver Nuggets rebuilt on the fly after trading the All-Star Carmelo Anthony to the Knicks, and now boast a fluid team that can contend in the N.B.A.’s Western Conference.
